java 文件外部归并排序

  • java (3)
  • java 3
10 July 2016

Overview

文件外部排序，就是把结果落磁盘，用于内存小情况下的排序。

试一下hexo的代码功能。这是最近写的对文件外部归并排序，代码如下： 


import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;


/**
 * Created by bbw on 16/7/8.
 * 用于文件排序的类
 */
public class FileSort {

    private int BUFFER_LINES=3000000;
    private String key;
    Collection<String> filecollection;
    Queue<String> splitCollection;
    String output;

    /**
     *
     * @param key
     * 比较的字段
     * @param fileInput
     * 文件输入集合
     * @param output
     * 输出文件名字
     */

    public FileSort(String key,Collection<String> fileInput,String output){
        this.filecollection=fileInput;
        this.key=key;
        this.splitCollection =new LinkedList<String>();
        this.output=output;
    }

    /**
     * 排序流程,先分给小文件排序,最后归并
     * @throws IOException
     */

    public void sort() throws IOException{
        for (String file:filecollection){
            split(file);
        }
        mergeFile(output);
    }

    /**
     * 分割文件,每个文件一定的行数
     * @param fileName
     * @throws IOException
     */

    private   void split(String fileName)
            throws IOException{

        BufferedReader bf=new BufferedReader(new FileReader(new File(fileName)));
        int count=0;
        String line;
        boolean complete=false;
        while (!complete){
            TreeSet<String> set=new TreeSet<String>(new KeyComparetor(key));
            int index=BUFFER_LINES;
            for (int i=0;i<BUFFER_LINES&&!complete;i++){
                line=bf.readLine();
                if(line==null){
                    complete=true;
                    index=i;
                }
                else {
                    set.add(line);
                }
            }
            if(index>0){
                String partFileName=fileName+".part"+count;
                count++;
                splitCollection.add(partFileName);
                FileWriter fw=new FileWriter(new File(partFileName));
                for (String sortLine:set){
                    fw.write(sortLine+"\n");

                }
                fw.flush();
                fw.close();

            }
        }





    }

    /**
     * 归并分割文件
     * @param outPath
     */

    private void mergeFile(String outPath){
        Queue<String> fileList=splitCollection;
        Queue<String> newList =new LinkedList<String>();
        int count=1;
        while (fileList.size()!=1){
            while (fileList.size()>=2){
                String newfilename="merge"+count;
                count++;
                mergeTwoFile(fileList.poll(),fileList.poll(),newfilename);
                newList.add(newfilename);

            }
            if (fileList.size()==1){
                newList.add(fileList.poll());
            }

            while (newList.size()!=0){
                fileList.add(newList.poll());
            }


        }
        File lastFile=new File(fileList.poll());
        lastFile.renameTo(new File(outPath));

    }

    private void mergeTwoFile(String file1,String file2,String outFile){
        try {
            BufferedReader bf1 = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(new File(file1)));
            BufferedReader bf2=new BufferedReader(new FileReader(new File(file2)));
            FileWriter fw=new FileWriter(new File(outFile));
            String l1,l2;
            l1=bf1.readLine();
            l2=bf2.readLine();
            while (l1!=null&&l2!=null){
                if(l1.substring(8,15).compareTo(l2.substring(8,15))>0){
                    fw.write(l2+"\n");
                    l2=bf2.readLine();
                }
                else {
                    fw.write(l1 + "\n");
                    l1=bf1.readLine();
                }

            }

            if(l1==null){
                while (l2!=null){
                    fw.write(l2+"\n");
                    l2=bf2.readLine();
                }
            }
            else if(l2==null){
                while (l1!=null){
                    fw.write(l1+"\n");
                    l1=bf1.readLine();
                }
            }
            fw.flush();
            fw.close();
            bf1.close();
            bf2.close();


        }
        catch (Exception e){
            e.printStackTrace();
        }

    }





    class KeyComparetor implements Comparator<String>{
        private String key;
        public KeyComparetor(String key){
            this.key=key;


        }
        @Override
        public int compare(String o1, String o2) {
            int a1=o1.indexOf(key);
            int b1=o1.indexOf("\t",a1);
            int a2=o2.indexOf(key);
            int b2=o2.indexOf("\t",a2);
            if(o1.substring(a1+key.length()+1,b1).compareTo(o2.substring(a2+key.length()+1,b2))>0)
                return 1;
            return -1;

        }
    }

}
